choose.when: select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as name from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no order by g_no desc, o_no
choose.otherwise: select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as name from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no and (b.title like '%${_parameter }%' or b.contents like '%${_parameter }%') order by g_no desc, o_no

mapper.insert: insert into board values (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), ifnull((select max(a.g_no) from board a), 0)+1, 1, 0, #{userNo })
